Generation VI.X: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
Generation VI.Y: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It draws prey near with its blinking lights and then wraps them up in its long tentacles and holds them in place.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: When exchanging information with others of its kind, it flashes the light-emitting spots on its body in a complex rhythm.

Generation VIII.Sword: It spins while making its luminescent spots flash. These spots allow it to communicate with others by using different patterns of light.
Generation VIII.Shield: By exposing foes to the blinking of its luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them, and then it seizes the chance to flee.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It protects itself from tough foes by flashing its luminescent spots to discourage them.
Generation IX.Violet: Being upside-down improves its blood flow and clears its mind, causing the power of its psychic moves to increase dramatically.

Generation VI.X: Route 8 , Azure Bay , Friend Safari ( Dark )
Generation VI.Y: Route 8 , Azure Bay , Friend Safari ( Dark )

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Route 1 , Ancient Poni Path , Poni Gauntlet , Poni Wilds
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Route 1 , Ancient Poni Path , Poni Gauntlet , Poni Wilds

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 7 , Route 9 , Bridge Field , Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills Watchtower Ruins , West Lake Axewell , Motostoke Riverbank , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 7 , Route 9 , Bridge Field , Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills Watchtower Ruins , West Lake Axewell , Motostoke Riverbank , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Fields of Honor , Challenge Beach , Training Lowlands , Loop Lagoon

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Coastal Biome , Torchlit Labyrinth Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
